name: Disembodied
description:
Disembodied is a 3D narrative time loop escape game in which users play as a disgruntled father, trapped in a hell of his past sins.  The player is tasked with collecting items hidden in the game environment in order to interact with items scattered across the different rooms. This allows the player to progress through the game and find the keycode to escape the house before the timer hits 0. Locate items by uncovering clues and exploring the game world; certain items are necessary for progressing in the game and revealing more aspects of the narrative. By piecing together bits of dialogue and game imagery, the player will be able to find the code to escape. A keypad by the living room door will enable the player to escape the house and end the game loop if the proper code is inputted.

by Untitled No. 5

Game  Director: Maurice Hendricks

Art & Music Director: Ian King

Animation: Isaiah Saunders

Asset Design: Miles Every
